layout.singingstanza: Hark, here is a hid -- den mys -- t'ry, Hid -- den from the hu -- man his -- t'ry! Hark and take this glo -- rious mys -- t'ry, Christ will be one with you! Glo -- ry, glo -- ry, hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Glo -- ry, glo -- ry, hal -- le -- lu -- jah! Hark and take this glo -- rious mys -- t'ry, Christ will be one with you!

lyrics.stanza: Hark, here is a hidden myst'ry, Hidden from the human hist'ry! Hark and take this glorious myst'ry, Christ will be one with you! Glory, glory, hallelujah! Glory, glory, hallelujah! Hark and take this glorious myst'ry, Christ will be one with you!
